# Core Rule 3 - No discrimination Prejudice towards race, ethnicity, species, sex, gender, sexual orientation, disability, and other intrinsic attributes is considered discriminatory and prohibited.
Derogatory terms or phrases are considered prejudicical and prohibited.
## Examples [color=#449944]Appropriate:[/color] - Using "gay" as a statement
[color=#994444]Prohibited:[/color] - Using "gay" as a negative attribute - Using derogatory terms like "homo", "tranny", or "retard" in any context
